page.title: 06A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: When I get up in the morning I go to the bathroom and do the normal things you do in a bathroom like brushing your teeth, washing your hands and face and brushing my hair. Then I walk back to my bedroom. By this time my mum and dad are getting up. I get dressed and go down stairs to have my breakfast. I get my bag ready for school and go. When I get to school we go into the yard. At 9 o'clock we go into school and get on with our work. At 10.40 we go out to play, coming in at 10.55 and get on with even more work! That is except for Tuesdays when we have P.E. Lunch is at 12 noon. We start back work at 13.15. At 15.30 we go home!! I have my tea then I watch T.V. I have a shower, watch more T.V. then go to bed and do some reading before going to sleep.
